instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to crop. At the bottom, tap Crop . Touch and drag the border. When you re done, tap anywhere else in your slide.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to mask. At the bottom, tap Crop . At the bottom, tap Mask . Tap the shape you want. The shape will mask your image. To adjust your shape, touch and drag the border.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to adjust. At the top, tap format . Tap Recolor to choose a filter. Tap Adjustments to adjust transparency, brightness, and contrast. When you're done, tap anywhere else in the slide to close.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to adjust. At the top, click Format . At the bottom, tap Drop shadow . Turn Apply drop shadow on. Choose a color for your drop shadow. When you're done, tap anywhere else in the slide to close.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Docs app. Open a document. Tap the image you want to add a border to. At the top right, tap Format . Choose a line color, weight, and dash.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to add a border to. In the top, tap Format . Choose a border color, weight, and dash. When you're done, tap anywhere else in the slide to close.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Docs app. Open a document. Tap the image you want to reset. In the top right, tap Format . Tap Reset image .

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Docs app. Open a document. In the top right, tap More . Turn on "Print Layout" . Tap the image you want to adjust. You can adjust the size of an image or rotate it: Resize: Touch and drag the squares along the edges. Rotate: Touch and drag the circle attached to the image.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Slides app. Open a presentation. Tap the image you want to adjust. You can adjust the size of an image or rotate it: Resize: Touch and drag the squares along the edges. Rotate: Touch and drag the circle attached to the image.
